name: radiok-api
description: A app that will provide a RESTfull api that scrapes musikhjalpens website for the current value of radioK's contribution to the charity event. It will also fetch sales data from a shopify store to combine with the charity data to provide a total of money gathered for the charity. In addition it will provide data for monetary triggers that will be fetched from csv.
author: sebastianzeed@gmail.com
